00016     template <unsigned D> struct NumAxes {
00017         enum { num = NumAxes<D-1>::num+D-1 };
00018     };
00019     template <> struct NumAxes<0> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00020     template <> struct NumAxes<1> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00021 
00023 
00032     template <unsigned D> class RotationAxes {
00033         public:
00039             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00040                 throw NotYetImplementedException(
00041                         "RotationAxes<"+Globals::Instance().itoa(D)+">::axis("+
00042                         Globals::Instance().itoa(which)+", "+
00043                         Globals::Instance().itoa(index)+")");
00044             }
00045         private:
00047             static unsigned _axis[2][NumAxes<D>::num];
00048     };
00049 
00050     template <> class RotationAxes<4> {
00051         public:
00052             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00053                 return _axis[which][index];
00054             }
00055         private:
00056             static unsigned _axis[2][6];
00057     };
00058 
00059     template <> class RotationAxes<3> {
00060         public:
00061             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00062                 return _axis[which][index];
00063             }
00064         private:
00065             static unsigned _axis[2][3];
00066     };

00073     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Rotation {
00074 
00075         public:
00077             Rotation<D, N>(): axis() { }
00078 
00080 
00082             Rotation<D, N> (N r0, ... );
00083 
00085 
00087             N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00089 
00091             N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00092 
00094 
00096             operator Matrix<D, N>() const;
00097 
00100             Rotation<D, N> &operator+= (const Rotation<D, N> &);
00101 
00103             operator bool() const { return axis.sqnorm() != 0.; }
00104 
00106             const Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> r() const { return axis; }
00107 
00108         private:
00110             Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> axis;
00111     };
00112 
00113     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::Rotation (N r0, ... ):
00114             axis() {
00115         axis[0] = r0;
00116         va_list argp;
00117         va_start (argp, r0);
00118         for (unsigned i = 1; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00119             axis[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00120         }
00121         va_end (argp);
00122     }
00123 
00124     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00125             N &Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00126         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00127         return axis[i];
00128     }
00129 
00130     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00131             N Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00132         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00133         return axis[i];
00134     }
00135 
00136     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::operator Matrix<D, N>() const {
00137         Matrix<D, N> R;
00138         for (unsigned i = 0; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00139             if (axis[i]) {
00140                 R *= Matrix<D, N>(RotationAxes<D>::axis(0, i), RotationAxes<D>::axis(1, i), axis[i]);
00141             }
00142         }
00143         return R;
00144     }
00145 
00146     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00147             Rotation<D, N> &Rotation<D, N>::operator +=(const Rotation<D, N>& that) {
00148         axis += that.axis;
00149         return *this;
00150     }

00158     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00159             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Rotation<D, N> &v) {
00160                 o << v.r();
00161                 return o;
00162             }
